Description: Rim fragment of North Ionian pottery plate with offset horizontal rim; pre-firing suspension hole in rim; exterior, on top of rim stopt meander band between bands; on floor, from outside: zig-zag; metopal band of double verticals alternating with squares (one with added red) between bands with added red bands lined in white; trace of inner frieze. rectangles on edge of rim; three bands on exterior wall. Hard fired, brown-grey, dense, moderately micaceous clay with small white inclusions (Munsell 5YR 7/4-6).
Curator's comments: Analysed with NAA by H Mommsen (in Villing & Schlotzhauer 2006, pp. 69-76): sample Nauk 37, Group B
Bibliographic references: Schlotzhauer & Villing 2006 / East Greek Pottery from Naukratis: The Current State of Research (pp. 56-57, fig. 2, Table 1)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GI.013)
Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 86, Nau 25, pl. 6e-f)
